intro: The following army list allows you to field an Exodite Eldar army.
strategy: Exodite armies have a strategy rating of 4.
Initiative: All formations have an initiative rating of 2+. The Dragon Knight, Wind Knight, and Exodite Knight Warhosts are subject to the Bravery special rule.

formations.name: Dragon Prince (0-1 per army)
formations.units: Replace on Dragonlord in the army with a Dragon Prince

formations.name: Wraithgate (0-1 per army)
formations.units: Replace one objective marker in the Eldar player's half of the table with a Wraithgate, this counts as an objective marker and a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way.

formations.name: Dragon Knight Warhost
formations.units: One Dragonlord and eight Dragon Knights
extraUnits: Add one Worldsinger character for 25 points
Replace two Dragon Knights with two Skyward Dragons for 25 points, or replace up to two Dragon Knights with Bloodfang Megadons for 25 points each

formations.name: Wind Knight Warhost
formations.units: One Dragonlord and eight Wind Knights
extraUnits: Add one Worldsinger character for 25 points

sections.name: Exodite Support Formations
sections.description: Up to three support formations per warhost formation

formations.name: Skyward Dragon Troupe
extraUnits: Replace two Skyward Dragons with two Bloodfang Megadons for 25 points

formations.name: Exodite Militia Troupe
formations.units: Eight Exodite Militia and a Worldsinger
extraUnits: Replace up to three Exodite Militia with Exodite Weapons Platforms for 25 points each

formations.name: Great Megadon Troupe
extraUnits: Add up to two Great Megadons for 125 points each

sections.name: Eldar Knight & Corsairs support
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

formations.name: Corsairs Raiding Party
formations.units: Four Corsair Warriors and one Felarch
extraUnits: Add up to two Corsair Wasp Walkers for 25 points each
Add up to two Corsair Veterans for 25 points each
Add up to two Ghostwalkers for 25 points each
Add enough Corsair Venoms to transport the formation for 25 points each. The entire formation must be transported if any Venoms are added.

formations.name: Corsairs Fire Support (0-1 per raiding party)
Exodite Knight Warhost
formations.units: Two Fire Gale, or two Bright Stallion, or two Towering Destroyer Knights
extraUnits: Add one Knight of the same configuration to the formation: 100 points
Add one Worldsinger character for 50 points
